title: It's Critical To Resolve the DevOps Tax on Central Teams
author: Travis McPeak
description: Netflix’s real-world examples show how automation and scalable practices reduce the DevOps burden on central teams, boosting stability and productivity.
cntitle: 解决中心团队 DevOps 税至关重要
cndescription: Netflix 的真实案例展示了自动化和可扩展实践如何减轻中央团队的 DevOps 负担，从而提高稳定性和生产力。
